tooltips.target_channel:
Enter the Telegram channel username to report
Example: channel_name (do not include @ symbol)
tooltips.clear_target: Clear the target channel input field
tooltips.report_count:
Set the number of reports to send per account
Recommended: 10-1000
tooltips.report_reason:
Select the reason for reporting
• spam: Spam content
• fake_account: Fake account
• violence: Violent content
• child_abuse: Child abuse
• pornography: Pornographic content
• geoirrelevant: Geographically irrelevant
tooltips.phone_number:
Enter your Telegram account phone number
Format: +country_code phone_number
Example: +86 13800138000
tooltips.add_account:
Add a new Telegram account
First time requires verification code
tooltips.refresh_accounts:
Refresh account list
Rescan session files in sessions directory
tooltips.start_reporting:
Start the reporting operation
Make sure accounts are added and target channel is set
tooltips.stop_reporting:
Stop the current reporting operation
Ongoing reports will be interrupted
tooltips.delete_account:
Delete selected account
This will permanently delete the account session file
tooltips.select_all:
Select all accounts
For batch operations
tooltips.deselect:
Deselect all
Clear current account selection
tooltips.api_id:
Enter your Telegram API ID
Get it from https://my.telegram.org
tooltips.api_hash:
Enter your Telegram API Hash
Get it from https://my.telegram.org
tooltips.auto_join:
When enabled, the program will automatically join the target channel
If already joined, this option won't rejoin
tooltips.report_interval:
Set the delay between reports
Recommended: 1-5 seconds to avoid restrictions
tooltips.save_settings:
Save all settings to configuration file
Settings will be loaded automatically on next startup
tooltips.clear_log:
Clear all log content
This action cannot be undone
tooltips.export_log:
Save current log to text file
You can choose save location and filename

confirmations.delete_account: Are you sure you want to delete account {name}?
